features.featureTitle: Add an admin-only navigation menu entry labeled "Profile Management" in `frontend/src/components/layout/AppShell.tsx` that is visible to admins (same visibility rules as existing admin items) and navigates directly to the Admin Dashboard profile management area by opening `/admin?tab=profiles`. The entry must appear in both the desktop navigation and the mobile sheet menu, and the active-route highlighting must work when the current URL is `/admin?tab=profiles`.
